page.title: 08INFANT GIRLS'GAMES IN N.YATE
page.content: {French skipping}:you need a long piece of elastic with the ends knotted together.Two people stand at each end of the elastic and a third person jumps in and out of the elastic.{ {Catch}:one child chases after a group of other children.{Chase}:almost the same as catch.{Skipping}:when one child swings a rope over her head and jumps over it when it touches the ground.{Sevensies}:when you take it in turns to throw a ball against a wall and catch it again in seven different ways.{Creepmouse}:one person stands against a wall with her back to the others while the other children creep up but when the other person turns round they have to stay still but if she sees someone moving she sends them back to the beginning.Out of these games{French skipping}is the favourite.
